casebody.data:
No. 10-10723. Ronnie Franklyn Hood, Petitioner v. Herb Jackson, Superintendent, Brown Creek Correctional Institution. 565 U.S. 846, 132 S. Ct. 164,

181 L. Ed. 2d 78,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 6232. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 414 Fed. Appx. 520.
